preparations.content: Insert simmering basket and weigh in rice, cardamom pods, cloves, cinnamon stick, ½ tsp turmeric and saffron threads then set aside on a plate.
Place oil and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>8 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Tip out and add to reserved rice.

Place water, ½ tsp turmeric and salt in mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket and steam <b>22 min/Varoma/speed 4<b>. Remove simmering basket, set aside and keep warm. Discard water then clean and dry mixing bowl.

Place onions and hazelnuts in mixing bowl then chop 5 sec/speed 5. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then toast 5 min/Varoma/speed 1. Serve the rice garnished with the onion and hazelnut mixture.
